channel.title: F5 on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in F5 on DefinIT

item.title: Deploying F5 BIG-IP Virtual Edition (VE) in AWS
item.description: Recently I was asked to develop some vRealize Orchestrator workflows against the F5 BIG-IP iControl REST API, but I was not able to test freely against a production appliance. After a lot of attempts to get in contact with F5 for a 90-day trial of the full version, or to purchase a lab license, I came up empty handed. The free version you can download from F5’s website is version 11.3, which does not feature the iControl REST API, which was released in 11.4.
